summary: The diff shows modifications to three files, but none contain the specific section title change requested in REQ-4. The modified SwissOnlineCouplesLandingPage.tsx file is truncated and does not show the section with title 'So läuft PaarWeg ab' or its replacement 'So funktioniert Online-Paarberatung bei PaarWeg'. The other modified files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) are metadata/configuration files unrelated to the actual implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change the section title 'So läuft PaarWeg ab' to 'So funktioniert Online-Paarberatung bei PaarWeg' on the Swiss Online Couples Landing Page
missing_requirements.reason: The diff of SwissOnlineCouplesLandingPage.tsx is truncated and does not show any section containing either the old title 'So läuft PaarWeg ab' or the new title 'So funktioniert Online-Paarberatung bei PaarWeg'. The visible portion only shows imports, SEO metadata setup, and the beginning of the hero section.
